record.jsxtip: Fires when the user changes the state of this checkbox.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event. May be null if this event is triggered by calling setChecked().
the state of the checkbox: 1 (checked) or 0.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this checkbox is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this checkbox before it is removed from the DOM.
